org.gvsig.tools.swing.api.usability

Interface UsabilitySwingManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultUsabilitySwingManager

    public interface UsabilitySwingManager
    Creates common Swing components which take into account usability guides defined for the gvSIG project.

    • Method Summary

      • createJNullSpinner

        javax.swing.JSpinner createJNullSpinner(int dataType,
                                        java.lang.Object value,
                                        int filledMaximumWidth)
        Creates a spinner component that allows null values. It distinguishes between number, date and floating point models based on their dataType.
        Parameters:
        text - the text component
        value - the initial value
        value - the maximum filling size
        Returns:
        a spinner GUI component.

      • createJNullSpinner

        Parameters:
        int - the data type of dynobjectmanager.
        value - the initial value
        Returns:
        a spinner GUI component.
